                           HarmonicBond[] aBackboneBonds)
        Constructor Note: NO checks are performed.
        Parameters:
        aMoleculeName - Name of molecule
        aTotalMoleculeParticleNumber - Total number of all particles of molecules
        aSingleMoleculeParticleNumber - Number of particles of a single molecule
        aParticleTokens - Particle tokens
        aParticleBackboneIndices - Particle backbone indices
        aR_x - Current x-position of particle in simulation box
        aR_y - Current y-position of particle in simulation box
        aR_z - Current z-position of particle in simulation box
        aBondOffsets - Bond offsets
        aBackboneBonds - Backbone bonds (may be null)
